participant_1.background:
I check my nails to see if they are still looking good.
i can draw.
my favorite food is pasta.
i race cars for a living.
I'm not very close to my family, but I love my garden.

participant_2.background:
My job at the gas station is going well, but I'm having trouble keeping up with my schoolwork.
I don't always remember to give my cats enough food.
i am lusting after the neighbour pool boy.
I check my phone to see if there are any messages.
I start networking with other writers and joining writing groups to get inspiration and feedback on my work.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for fun?
I like to write, draw, and play games. I'm also trying to get in shape.
That's great! I love to draw and play games too. I'm not so good at getting in shape.
I'm not very good at it either, but I'm trying!
I'm glad to hear it! What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of games, but I'm mostly into RPGs and strategy games.
Those are great genres! I love RPGs too. I'm not as good at strategy games, but I'm trying to learn.
I'm sure you'll get the hang of it! What's your favorite RPG?
I love The Witcher 3! It's so big and immersive.
I've heard great things about that game! I've been meaning to try it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
What are some of your other interests?
I like to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family and friends.
Those are all great things to do! I love to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different kinds of books, but I'm mostly into fantasy and science fiction.
Those are great genres! I love fantasy and science fiction too.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
